changeSet.author: sgf
sgf
changeSet.sql: UPDATE metadata.project project SET northern_latitude = (select end_range FROM metadata.coordinate_axis axis, metadata.project project2, metadata.geospatial_coordinate_axis geo_axis WHERE axis.geophysical_properties_id = project2.dataset_id and axis.id = geo_axis.id and axis.coordinate_type_id = 0 and project2.id = project.id ) , southern_latitude = (select start_range FROM metadata.coordinate_axis axis, metadata.project project2, metadata.geospatial_coordinate_axis geo_axis WHERE axis.geophysical_properties_id = project2.dataset_id and axis.id = geo_axis.id and axis.coordinate_type_id = 0 and project2.id = project.id ) , eastern_longitude = (select end_range FROM metadata.coordinate_axis axis, metadata.project project2, metadata.geospatial_coordinate_axis geo_axis WHERE axis.geophysical_properties_id = project2.dataset_id and axis.id = geo_axis.id and axis.coordinate_type_id = 1 and project2.id = project.id ) , western_longitude = (select start_range FROM metadata.coordinate_axis axis, metadata.project project2, metadata.geospatial_coordinate_axis geo_axis WHERE axis.geophysical_properties_id = project2.dataset_id and axis.id = geo_axis.id and axis.coordinate_type_id = 1 and project2.id = project.id ) ;
